citations.narrative:
The enclosure containing the African Crested porcupine is surrounded by a perimeter fence that is not 6 feet tall. A
fence not 6 feet in height may not serve as an adequate secondary containment system. The licensee can build a
fence of appropriate height or request a variance.
Correct within 30 days.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.

narrative:
3.127(d)
FACILITIES, OUTDOOR. 
The enclosure containing the African Crested porcupine is surrounded by a perimeter fence that is not 6 feet tall.  A
fence not 6 feet in height may not serve as an adequate secondary containment system.  The licensee can build a
fence of appropriate height or request a variance.  
Correct within 30 days.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
